Class Groper

java.lang.Object
  OceanObject
      Fish
          Groper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Actor
public class Groper
extends Fish

A simple model of a blue groper. Groper age, move, breed, and die. They eat herring.

Author:
Richard Jones, Michael Kolling and Matthew Maglennon

Method Detail

findLocationOfFood

protected Location findLocationOfFood(java.util.List<Location> surroundings)
Groper only eat herring and will search their surroundings for them. Once a herring is found it is eaten and its location is returned.

Specified by:
findLocationOfFood in class Fish
Parameters:
surroundings - List of locations around the groper

eat

private void eat(Fish dinner)
Will kill a fish and decrease hunger. Will add actions to thoughts if REPORT_DINNER is true.

Parameters:
dinner - The fish to be eaten.
